email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the low $50s. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in the laycan as October 15-18 to avoid any delays. Can you confirm this? Also, please send over the full vessel details and draft survey requirements. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can confirm the laycan as October 15-18. Attached are the full vessel details and draft survey requirements. Let me know if you need anything else. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the freight rate of $51.25 and the laycan of October 15-18. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ve attached the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if there are any amendments needed. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best regards, Sarah
